author: pieterdavid
body:
As discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22533#pullrequestreview-102575420 .
This removes the (unused) StripCPEfromTemplate option from the RecoLocalTracker/SiStripRecHitConverter package, and the related TrackClusterSplitter plugin from RecoLocalTracker/SubCollectionProducers.
I will add a link to this PR on the associated twiki pages to make sure people can find this back if it needs to be revived at some point.

CC: @mmusich @echabert @OlivierBondu @boudoul
title: Remove StripCPEfromTemplate
